module MemoriaDeInstrucoes(	input [5:0] Endereco,
		output [5:0] Opcode,
		output [4:0] CampoA,
		output [4:0] CampoB,
		output [4:0] CampoC,
		output [10:0] CampoD );

	wire [31:0] Memoria [29:0];
	wire [31:0] Instrucao;

	memoria[0]	=	32'b001110_00000_11011_0000000000000000;
	memoria[1]	=	32'b001110_00000_11100_0000000000100000;
	memoria[2]	=	32'b001110_00000_11101_0000000000101111;
	memoria[3]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000000100;
	memoria[4]	=	32'b001111_11011_00001_0000000000000000;
	memoria[5]	=	32'b010110_00000_00010_00000_00000000000;
	memoria[6]	=	32'b011011_00010_00000_00001_00000000000;
	memoria[7]	=	32'b010000_11011_00001_0000000000000000;
	memoria[8]	=	32'b001111_11011_00011_0000000000000000;
	memoria[9]	=	32'b011011_00011_00000_10001_00000000000;
	memoria[10]	=	32'b011011_10001_00000_00100_00000000000;
	memoria[11]	=	32'b010111_00100_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[12]	=	32'b000000_00000000000000000000000000;
	memoria[13]	=	32'b001111_11011_00101_0000000000000001;
	memoria[14]	=	32'b010110_00000_00110_00000_00000000000;
	memoria[15]	=	32'b011011_00110_00000_00101_00000000000;
	memoria[16]	=	32'b010000_11011_00101_0000000000000001;
	memoria[17]	=	32'b001111_11011_00111_0000000000000010;
	memoria[18]	=	32'b001111_11011_01000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[19]	=	32'b001111_11011_01001_0000000000000001;
	memoria[20]	=	32'b000010_01000_01001_01010_00000000000;
	memoria[21]	=	32'b011011_01010_00000_00111_00000000000;
	memoria[22]	=	32'b010000_11011_00111_0000000000000010;
	memoria[23]	=	32'b001111_11011_01011_0000000000000010;
	memoria[24]	=	32'b011011_01011_00000_10001_00000000000;
	memoria[25]	=	32'b011011_10001_00000_01100_00000000000;
	memoria[26]	=	32'b010111_01100_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[27]	=	32'b000000_00000000000000000000000000;
	memoria[28]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000011101;
	memoria[29]	=	32'b000001_00000000000000000000000000;

	assign Instrucao = Memoria[Endereco];
	assign Opcode = Instrucao[31:26];
	assign CampoA = Instrucao[25:21];
	assign CampoB = Instrucao[20:16];
	assign CampoC = Instrucao[15:11];
	assign CampoD = Instrucao[10:0];

endmodule
